channel.title: Edgevillepkz - A new Era of Pking
channel.description:
Credits to demise for the base. Heres some pics so you know what you will be working with.
<><Features><>
1) Fixed Xlog 2) Improved range following 3) Full melee following 4) New crafting interface 5) All the latest 474 animations 6) Improved effects for all barrow sets 7) Modern Ancient Magic Hovering 8) PvP Point system 9) Kill row system, EG kill more then one person in a row and you get bonus points. 10) Ranks system, you gain a title on ::yell dependant on the amount of kills you have. Eg if you had 50 kills on and you yelled it would say ("Playername, Officer:") 11) PvP timer like runescape 12) Fixed PvP timer bug against NPC’s 13) Full barrelchest anchor with balanced stats 14) PvP Drops system (1/200 Chance to gain an additional drop) 15) Inferno adz with attack effect 16) Dagon Hai with set effect 17) Improved graphical interfaces via client 18) New runescape Hitsplat effects 19) Christmas event (Not active, But Coded) 20) New runescape HP Bars 21) Equipment Interface, Client sided 22) Opening highscores via equipment tab 23) Full highscore system based on points that discludes admins+ 24) Instant dds special 25) Perfect claw special with correct emote and timing
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vpjgxi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/160bedw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/52c30x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2v3qal0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/125qu12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2j5aq3b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/snccn8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2h4hwz6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/rh1fl4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/dlgjna.png[/img]
Apply for Coder: Name Experience Why do you want to work with us?
If you wanna beta test pm me

item.title: Edgevillepkz - A new Era of Pking
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Credits to demise for the base.
Heres some pics so you know what you will be working with.

<><>

  1. Fixed Xlog
  2. Improved range following
  3. Full melee following
  4. New crafting interface
  5. All the latest 474 animations
  6. Improved effects for all barrow sets
  7. Modern Ancient Magic Hovering
  8. PvP Point system
  9. Kill row system, EG kill more then one person in a row and you get bonus points.
  10. Ranks system, you gain a title on ::yell dependant on the amount of kills you have. Eg if you had 50 kills on and you yelled it would say (“Playername, Officer:”)
  11. PvP timer like runescape
  12. Fixed PvP timer bug against NPC’s
  13. Full barrelchest anchor with balanced stats
  14. PvP Drops system (1/200 Chance to gain an additional drop)
  15. Inferno adz with attack effect
  16. Dagon Hai with set effect
  17. Improved graphical interfaces via client
  18. New runescape Hitsplat effects
  19. Christmas event (Not active, But Coded)
  20. New runescape HP Bars
  21. Equipment Interface, Client sided
  22. Opening highscores via equipment tab
  23. Full highscore system based on points that discludes admins+
  24. Instant dds special
  25. Perfect claw special with correct emote and timing
